alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 2:09PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM ON THE MIDDLE LOUP RIVER REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Along the Middle Loup River in parts of Sherman County. * WHEN...Until 615 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along low-lying pasture land along the river is expected. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 204 PM CST, the river gauge at Rockville reported a level of 8.4 feet. Flood stage is 8.5 feet. This is due to ice jamming in the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Loup City and Rockville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
